short_summary: Digitize C format videotapes for preservation and online access
description: Library and Archives Canada has approximately 10,000 hours of 1" Type C videotapes that need to be digitized for preservation and online access.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## Digitization of C Format Videotapes
### Reference Number: cb-275-948264

#### Date and Time
*   **Publication Date:** January 11, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 20, 2024, at 2:00 PM

#### Tender Details
The Library and Archives of Canada (LAC) invites proposals from qualified contractors to digitize approximately 10,000 hours (4,000 reels) of 1” Type C videotapes in its collection. The successful contractor will be responsible for converting the tapes into MXF wrapped lossless JPEG2000 files for preservation purposes and h.264 MP4 files for access purposes. Additionally, an .XML metadata file and a Quality Control Report file will be produced for each digitized tape.

#### Project Scope
The contractor will work on an as-and-when needed basis for a period of up to three years, with the option for extension for a maximum of two additional one-year periods.

#### Eligibility
This tender is open to firms that are registered in the Registry ofValue Added Tax (VAT) or are exempt from registration.

#### Application Requirements
Bidder must submit the following documents:
- Bid form
- Proof of eligibility
- Proof of qualifications
- Proof of experience

#### Contract Award
The contract award will be made to the bidder that submits the lowest price, which satisfies all technical and contract requirements.

#### Contact Information
*   **Contracting Entity Address:**
    *   550 de la Cité Blvd.
    *   Gatineau, Quebec
    *   J8T 0A7 Canada
*   **Contact Person:**
    *   Anne-Marie Aubry
    *   Phone Number: (1873)335-37351
    *   Email: [receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca](mailto:receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca)
*   **Attachments**
    *   Request for Proposal (RFP) Document
    *   Specifications and Standards Document

## Technical Specifications

*   Format: MXF wrapped lossless JPEG2000 files for preservation purposes
*   Format: h.264 MP4 files for access purposes
*   .XML metadata file and Quality Control Report file for each digitized tape

## Miscellaneous
